integer.tooltip: Specifies the number of rows spanned by a cell.
Specifies the number of grid columns spanned by a cell, column, or column group.

number.tooltip: Specifies the aspect value. The number refers to the aspect value of the first choice font.

name.tooltip: Do not preserve the font's x-height.

property.obsolete-tooltip: It is replaced by the 'margin-end' property.

property.percentage: see individual properties

property.tooltip: This property sets the background image of an element.

property.percentage: refer to the size of the box itself
allowed on 'background-position'
property.description: The background property is a shorthand property for setting the individual background properties (i.e., '', '', '', '' and '') at the same place in the style sheet.

property.percentage: refer to height of containing block
refer to width of containing block

property.applies: all elements except non-replaced inline elements and table elements

function.tooltip: This function returns as a string the value of attribute X for the subject of the selector.

name.tooltip: The page box should be set to the size of ISO A5 media: 148mm wide and 210 mm high.
The page box should be set to the size of IS0 A4 media: 210 mm wide and 297 mm high.
The page box should be set to the size of ISO A3 media: 297mm wide and 420mm high.
The page box should be set to the size of ISO B3 media: 176mm wide by 250mm high.
The page box should be set to the size of ISO B4 media: 250mm wide by 353mm high.
The page box should be set to the size of North American letter media: 8.5 inches wide and 11 inches high
The page box should be set to the size of North American legal: 8.5 inches wide by 14 inches high.
The page box should be set to the size of North American ledger: 11 inches wide by 17 inches high.
